metadata.title: CVE-2024-1550 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A malicious website could have used a combination of exiting fullscreenmode and `requestPointerLock` to cause the user's mouse to be re-positionedunexpectedly, which could have led to user confusion and inadvertentlygranting permissions they did not intend to grant. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 123, Firefox ESR < 115.8, and Thunderbird < 115.8.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
